summary: Verified image sizing fix on search results page. All images now properly fill their container width (100%) using native HTML img tags with objectFit: cover. All requested features working correctly.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Image sizing fix verified working. Search page all features working correctly. Previous iteration 157 had a critical bug with location selection causing infinite loop - this was on homepage not search page. If testing homepage location selection, verify that bug was fixed.
tests_passed: Search results page images fill container width (100%) - dimensions 291px x 180px
Images use native HTML img tag with inline styles: width:100%, height:100%, objectFit:cover
Location selector button visible with 'All Locations' text
Location selector opens modal on click
Search functionality works - can search for different terms
Category icons row displayed correctly (7 categories visible)
Listing cards display properly with images, prices, locations, negotiable badges
Grid layout working (4-5 columns on desktop viewport)

image_sizing_fix.evidence: All 5 listing images measured at 291px x 180px. Inline styles confirmed: width=100%, height=100%, objectFit=cover. Images fill parent container completely (fillsWidth=True, fillsHeight=True).

location_selector.evidence: Button with 'All Locations' text visible. Click opens 'Select Location' modal with search input and location options.

search_functionality.evidence: Searched 'phone' (5 results), then 'car' (18 results). Results text updates correctly, listings change.

category_icons_row.evidence: 7 categories visible: Auto & Vehicles, Properties, Electronics, Phones & Tablets, Home Furniture & Appliances, Fashion & Beauty, Jobs & Services

listing_cards_display.evidence: Cards show: prices (â‚¬/$ format), locations (Munich, Frankfurt, etc), negotiable badges, product titles, properly sized images

bug_fix_verified.original_issue: Images on search results page were not taking 100% width of their container
bug_fix_verified.fix_applied: Using native HTML img tags with inline styles (width: 100%, height: 100%, objectFit: cover) for web platform instead of React Native Image component
bug_fix_verified.verification: Confirmed working - images now display at 291px x 180px filling their 291px x 180px containers completely
